name: @davidsneighbour/debuglogger
description: A customizable logging wrapper for debugging with log levels, external handlers, and console replacement.
author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com>

scripts.release: npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run build && npm version minor -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run build && npm version major -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
